name: Greater Ukraine
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, o great hetman Ivan Sirko. Ukraine is one of the successors of the medieval realm of Kievan Rus. As such, Ukraine has a claim to the lands of the Rus alongside Russia. This has brought Ukraine and Russia conflict against each other on who leads Kiev. Ukraine is led by Ivan Sirko and his Cossack hosts.
startIntroPart2: Lord Hetman, the Cossacks look to you to lead them into freedom and greatness. Will you wrest the Rus away from the Muscovite pretenders? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: We were trying to achieve peace, but with neighbour as you, it appeared to be impossible !
attacked: Have you declared war on us? This was a huge mistake on your part, prepare to be destroyed!
defeated: You defeated our country on the battlefield, but you will never defeat our devotion to liberty ! One day, the Ukrainian people will raise again, and again, and again until we finally rule over our land.
introduction: Greetings, stranger! I am Volodymyr Zelensky, president of Ukraine. I hope our civilisations will find common ground in all our affairs.
hateHello: You again! What did you want?
tradeRequest: Well, how is my proposal to you?
